title: 32 The 'FairKitchens' Movement Addresses The Unhealthy Culture In Today's Kitchens
description: The 'FairKitchens' movement is a response to cultural issues that we have seen spotlighted in recent months in our industry. But the truth is a lot of these issues have been around since the beginning.
itunes:author: Foodable Network
itunes:subtitle: The 'FairKitchens' movement is a response to cultural issues that we have seen spotlighted in recent months in our industry. But the truth is a lot of these issues have been around since the beginning.
